褢字的基本解释

褢
huái
衣袖。
古同“怀”：“褢诚秉忠。”

褢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huái］
［《廣韻》户乖切，平皆，匣。］
“懷1”的古字。

褢字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　褢； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1122第07
【唐韻】戸乖切【韻會】乎乖切，?音懷。【說文】袖也。一曰藏也。又【玉篇】胷䘳藏物也，抱也。在衣曰褢，在手曰握。　又與懷通。【前漢·外戚傳】褢誠秉忠，維義是從。　又猾褢，獸名。【山海經】穴居老蟄如人而彘鬛。　【廣韻】一作?。【類篇】或作?。

褢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
褢字的起名意思

暂无。

huái

["Guangyun" households are obediently cut, flat, boxed. ]

[Shen Jixia] [The Department of Clothing Characters] 　褢; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1122 Page 07
[Tang Yun] Be obedient and cut [Yunhui] Almost obediently,? Yinhuai. 【Said Wen】Sleeves too. One said to hide. Also 【Jade Articles】The treasures in the crouch are also, and they are also hug. In the clothes, it is called 袢, and in the hand, it is called holding.　And Huaitong again. [Previous Han·Foreign Relations Biography] You are sincere and loyal, while Weiyi is obedience.　 and cunning, animal name. [Shanhaijing] The cave dweller is like a human being but stunned.　【Guangyun】A work?. 【Classes】Or for?.
